location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 40 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports that military forces are gathering to move against Reis Bagur Cahn [Ra'is Baqer Khan] and that Shakih Nassir is on his way back to Bushire. The letter also reports that there was communication between Reis Bagur Cahn and the Chaub [the Banu Ka'b tribal confederacy] following his capture of Bushire and notes that some vessels had departed from Bushire to prevent the Chaub from attacking Shaikh Nassir.
